fields.summary: iOS: Xcode5.1-b5 - Version Mismatch warning, asking for 3 digits when Validating app, packaged for iTunes store

fields.description:
h5. Description
When we package the app for iTunes Store, the version of the archived app has 3 digits (1.0.0). However, the version of the app and the bundle version have 2.
fields.summary: iOS: Xcode - Packaged application's version has 3 digits vs 2 in the app, registered in iTunes connect

Mac osx 10.9.5 Mavericks
Appcelerator Studio, build: 3.4.0.201409161950
